ERROR_CONEXION_INTERNET: No Internet connection, try again later
ERROR_CONEXION_INTERNET_RECARGA: No internet connection, please reload the page.
PERMITIR_ACCESO_BIOMETRICO: Do you want to allow biometric access?
Error huella: An error occurred while trying to register biometric data.
Usuario invalido: The username needs at least 4 characters.
Contraseña invalida: The password needs at least 8 characters.
Haz click aqui si quieres modificar tu c: Click here if you want to change your email address.
Si inicias sesion con Google no puedes c: If you start session with Google you can't change your email
No puedes restablecer la contraseña. Tu: You cannot restore the password. Your account is registered through Google.
Correo Secundario: Recovery Email with which you registered
Correo inexistente: This recovery email is not associated with any account
Reestablecer email: Enter the link we sent to your recovery email.
Reestablecer contraseña: Check your email to set your new password.
Error reestablecer: An unexpected error occurred while trying to reset your password.
Error reestablecer email: An unexpected error occurred while trying to reset your email.
Contraseña actualizada: Congratulations, your password has been updated!
Error activando la cuenta: An unexpected error occurred while activating your account. Please try again later.
Completar_Campos: Please complete the fields before logging in.
Completa_Campos_Huella: Complete the fields before adding the fingerprint.
Error login: An unexpected error occurred while logging in.
Error login huella: You have canceled your fingerprint login.
Cuenta existente: The email you are trying to register as your primary email already exists, please use another one.
Error registro: The recovery email cannot be the same as the primary email.
Ese correo de recuperación ya existe, ag: That recovery email already exists, add another one
Confirmar Email: Account created. Check your email to confirm your account before logging in.
Placeholder Nuevo Email: Please enter your new email address.
Enlace nuevo correo: A link has been sent to confirm the new email you provided.
Error enlace nuevo correo: An error occurred while trying to register the new email.
No ha confirmado su email: You haven't confirmed your email. Go to your email and confirm your account to log in.
Felicitaciones login: Congratulations {{username}} you have successfully logged in!
Login incorrecto huella: You have canceled the fingerprint login
Felicitaciones logout: Congratulations, you have successfully logged out!
Sesion expirada: Your session has expired, please log in again.
Descripcion: Our platform allows you to register all the people who have bought products on credit or on loan from you. We help you keep your accounts clear with friends, family and customers. Keep a friendly and organized record of who owes you, making it easier for you to manage your money.
Error al actualizar perfil: An unexpected error occurred while trying to update the profile.
No autorizado: You don't have permission to perform this action
¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar tu: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
No tienes clientes registrados, registra: You don't have any registered clients, register a client
No tienes productos registrados, registr: You don't have any registered products, register a product
Placeholder Fiado: Enter the amount to be deposited
Fiado no hay: No credits have been recorded. Add some
Fiado error: An error occurred while trying to add the credit.
Fiado invalido: The amount needs at least 1 number
Fiado Alerta eliminar: Are you sure you want to delete the credit?
El monto no puede ser mayor a la deuda: Amount cannot be greater than debt
El fiado fue eliminado porque ya no hay: The credit was eliminated because the debt was already settled.
Fiado existente: The client cannot have more than 1 credit
Producto no hay: There are no products. Add some.
Producto Alerta eliminar: Are you sure you want to delete the product
Producto invalido: The product needs at least 3 characters

Producto error editar: An unexpected error occurred while updating the product
Producto error agregar: An unexpected error occurred while adding the product
Producto error: There is already a product with this name
